title: The COVID-19 world - Are we there yet?
summary: The spreading of SARS-CoV-2 virus infection is still of great concern as well as clinical and social interest. ...
abstract: The spreading of SARS-CoV-2 virus infection is still of great concern as well as clinical and social interest. The key to conquer this pandemic would be establishment of herd immunity by vaccination and of treatment, and I have discussed issues we are facing now.
